ygData.messageBody:
> Date: Thu, 3 Feb 2000 16:12:37 -0700
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> Subject: RE: RE: Harmonic's Super Rant Session (OT, very long)
>
> I'd love to hear the results! But ooh the downtime!
>
> I was part of an all caster group of six that ventured into the new Paw.
We
> had 2 enchanters, a shaman, a cleric, a mage, and a wizard. It was boring
> kinda. We either annihilated the mobs we faced or got forced to gate real
> quick. With 3 pets we were able to get away every time though. If we'd
> have had 2 necros and just 1 enchanter and no mage I think it would have
> been even easier.

Just curious as to why you didn't want a mage? Necro pets were better
before the weapon delay adjustment, but now I think mages are just as good,
if not better. Necros are very mana effecient, but can't unload on
something fast like a mage can.


Instead of the all melee group, we went the other way. We have 4 mages,
enchanter and a wizard, all gnomes on VZ around level 11-13. With 5 pets
and blasting power from everyone, we take things down very fast. I don't
think a necro's DOT would get halfway done before everything was dead. With
plenty of summoned bandages, everyone has a good Bind Wound skill.
We can bandage up anyone to half health in 10 seconds or so.

Wayne
